name: XSLT Injection Scanner
description: Detects XSLT (Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformations) injection vulnerabilities that can lead to server-side code execution, file disclosure, and SSRF.
author: Dominator Team
remediation: Avoid using user input in XSLT transformations. If necessary, use strict allowlisting and disable dangerous XSLT functions. Use XSLT 1.0 without extensions.
